<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Global access point for the JIT debugging interface designed for use with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// singleton toolbox. Handles thread-safe registration and deregistration of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// object files that are in executable memory managed by the client of this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gdbregistrationlistener-cpp-/gdbjitregistrationlistener"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">GDBJITRegistrationListener : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jiteventlistener/#a01ee72597bbb2b490cf27892d4509add">JITEventListener</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Lock used to serialize all jit registration events, since they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// modify global variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Only a single instance of GDBJITRegistrationListener is ever created,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and so the lock can be a member variable of that instance. This ensures</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// destructors are run in the correct order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a52d48084c5b60251870b6118e4670fee">sys::Mutex</a> JITDebugLock;</span></CodeLine>
